data.title: Audition Directors — Nutcracker.com
data.text:
Sarah Cascone is an accomplished dancer with a diverse training background spanning various dance disciplines. Beginning her journey at the Music & Dance Academy in Marra (NA), she honed her skills through intensive courses and workshops with esteemed instructors such as Michele Villanova, Anbeta Toromani, and Alessandro Macario.

Aleksandra Grys is an accomplished ballet dancer currently serving as coryphée at the Grand Theatre in Łódź. She began her training at the Polish National Ballet School in Bytom, where she honed her skills from 2004 to 2013. Aleksandra holds a master’s degree from the Medical University of Łódź, demonstrating her dedication to both arts and academics.

Step into a world of enchantment with Maria Molotsiyan, a remarkable ballet artist and teacher who has captivated audiences worldwide with her exquisite talent and passion for the art of dance. A true luminary in the realm of choreography, Maria carries an impressive resume that speaks volumes of her dedication and expertise.
